definitions.definition: Widely cultivated cereal grass, typically Avena sativa.
definitions.example: The main forms of oat are meal and bran.

definitions.definition: Any of the numerous species, varieties, or cultivars of any of several similar grain plants in genus Avena.
definitions.example: The wild red oat is thought to be the ancestor of modern food oats.

definitions.definition: (usually as plural) The seeds of the oat, a grain, harvested as a food crop.
A simple musical pipe made of oat-straw.
A mass of oat plants (genus Avena, especially Avena sativa).
definitions.example: Oats are in the north corner of the farm.

definitions.definition: Seeds of an oat plant, especially prepared as food.
